features: 👍【Upgrade Android TV 11.0 Smart Projector】The smart projector built-in Android System, includes Netflix, YouTube，Prime Video and 8000+ apps from app store, you can watch streaming over 1,000,000+ movies and TV.This projector with wifi and bluetooth has built-in stereo speakers with 360° stereo surround sound to enjoy your movie night and finals night!

👍【Dustproof & Small Portable Projector】This new upgraded fully sealed optical smart projector, and the body of the compact and lightweight design, only 2.9lb, Effectively prevents 80% dust ingress，do not have to worry about the lens black spot. LED life of up to 100,000h, to extend the life of the projector

🔥【Native 1080P & Support 4k Projector】This FHD 1080P projector with wifi and bluetooth supports 4K video and has a brightness of up to 700ansi/15,000lm, presenting clear, bright and vivid HD image effects. Adopting ultra-fast WiFi6 and two-way Bluetooth5.2, the transmission is stable and the movie watching is smooth, and it can easily connect with all kinds of Bluetooth speaker devices, so that you can get an immersive movie watching experience

💖【Electric Focus & Auto Keystone Correction】This video projector has Electric focus，one button remote control operation, you can easily get a clear projection picture。The also auto keystone correction/4P correction/50%-100% zoom function. The proyector projection screen up to 150'' and less than 30DB noise, making it the perfect choice for enjoying home theater, movie night, and finals night!

💖【Multi-compatibility & Technical Support】This compact multifunctional smart projector can be held in one hand, easy to carry for any scene. Equipped with HDMI/USB/AV/ audio interface, you can easily connect to your cell phone/computer/TV Stick/Switch, built-in office software, you can easily present Word/PPT/PDF/Excel.Provide 3 years maintenance and lifetime technical support, feel free to contact us for app update issues.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Aubor Smart Projector with Android TV, Best Choice for Home Theater!
Up to 95% Color Uniformity, 4K Projector for Ultimate Experience!
Previous page Next page 1 Ultra-Fast 5G+2.4G WiFi-6 2 Bluetooth 5.2 3 Latest Electric Focus 4 Max 150'' Large Screen
Previous page Next page Support Mirroring Screen Cast, Stands and Ceiling Projections
Previous page Next page Smart Projector with Netflix,YouTube,Prime Video,WPS Office,8000+Apps

Can I access and use Netflix/Prime Video/YouTube on the projector? This upgraded smart projector with built-in Netflix/ Prime Video/ YouTube app. Connect directly to the internet to play your favorite movies or TV channels without having to buy an additional TV stick. How do I use the remote control to focus on a blurred picture or video? When using the projector, you can easily get a 1080P Full HD picture by long-pressing the F+ or F- button on the remote control to focus. Is the projector compatible with external Bluetooth devices? This Bluetooth projector features two-way Bluetooth 5.2 for fast and stable connection to a variety of Bluetooth devices, and it has 2 built-in stereo speakers for an immersive experience, so enjoy your music time! How do I hang a projector from the ceiling for projection use? 1. Remove the four silicone feet on the bottom of the projector to expose the mounting holes. 2. Screw the ceiling mount into the mounting holes. 3. Set the projector to hang projection mode so that the picture plays upward normally.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have used this so much since getting it. It can basically function as a TV because of the Android OS and I watch youtube and netflix on it all the time. You can also install Spotify onto it. Keystoning the projector was simple and I got it to cover an entire 12 foot wide wall basically. The image is crisp and visitors were pretty impressed with it. Unfortunately, it is true that you do need to darken the room significantly to enjoy a show to the fullest, but for me, I prioritized portability more.The speakers sound like you are listening from your laptop. It might sound like a nicer laptop with good speakers, but a laptop regardless. My friend brought over his JBL speaker that he got for a Benjamin to hook up to bluetooth and it was really noticeable how much more realistic and 3D the sound got immediately. It was not a big issue for me as I was planning to get myself a speaker soon anyway.The fans are fairly quiet. You can hear them, but as soon as the audio is going, it is drowned out.I do wish the power cord were a bit longer though.Overall, I am still extremely happy with this projector and it's been one of my favorite items in 2023. For that reason, I will give it 5/5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Un muy buen producto para el hogar, probé cinco opciones:A: la primera con las aplicaciones nativas, es decir con Netflix y YouTube, funciona perfecto, muy bien, aunque no he podido instalar Star Plus.B: con Bluetooth desde desde el móvil, transmite muy bien, pero tiene restricción con aquellas aplicaciones que condicionan la conexión, por ejemplo con Claro video. C: Conexión por cable directamente HDMI. Entre URL PC y el proyector funciona excelente, todo adecuadamente.D: lo máximo, conecté Chromecast y funcionan todas las aplicaciones y la transmisión es muy buena tanto desde el PC como desde el móvil.E: En todos los casos puse Bluetooth simultáneo para el sonido con un parlante y funciona excelente .Muy buen producto lo recomiendo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Portable cinema experience, indoor or out!
reviews.reviewText: Aubor Smart Projector was shipped fast. Packaged very nice and secure. Priced reasonably for the amount of features and its preinstalled apps ( such as Netflix, YouTube and more) . Love the compact size, which is perfect for travel. This compact size allows you to bring the home cinema experience with you where ever you go.Setup is intuitive and very easy to navigate on screen instructions via remote or smartphone.A few key points to remember are:-Built-in speakers are very good for an average size room but we will use the Bluetooth function and add external speakers for a full surround sound.-Best viewing is of course in a completely darkened room vs well lit room. If in a room during the day, sitting within about 15-20 feet makes viewing acceptable, otherwise close any/all curtains for best viewing. To make sure you get the best quality viewing use a screen! Cloth screens are ok but best are the pull down ones!-The FANS are fairly quiet but can still be heard if immediate area is quiet.-Keystoning the projector was simple-Resolution is good to very good depending on the distance you choose-Aubor provides 3 years maintenance and lifetime technical supportOverall, a really nice compact portable projector for the price to bring the cinema experience inside your home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well - have to use remote
reviews.reviewText: Once I stole batteries out of another remote (somehow was out of AAAs), this worked well. The auto focus was a little challenging for me, but I got it to work well enough. If you don’t have batteries for the remote, you will not be able to use this projector. I got it displayed on a large blank wall in our living room, but it would work equally well on a big screen, white sheet, or inflatable screen outdoors in the summer. It was relatively say to set up on my wifi and from there I could view YouTube videos and more importantly watch Netflix. I haven’t tried any of the other apps yet, but don’t anticipate any issues. We mainly use for Netflix. The built in speakers work well enough for indoor viewing - not sure if they will be sufficient when we move outdoors during nicer weather, but we’ll see. There is also a USB cable and port as well as a hdmi port so you could conceivably connect other media to the projector as well. It also supposedly has the ability to use AirPlay, but I haven’t tried that because it is easier to just connect directly to my wifi rather than waste my phone battery. Overall this projector is quick and easy to set up - as long as you have AAA batteries for then remote, you can be up and watching movies in under 10 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s nice for the price
reviews.reviewText: We really like the projector especially for the price and it actually being 1080p with good picture quality. I like how all adjustments can be made from the remote, focus, screen size and so on. What I don’t like is that it has a hard time connecting to my WiFi and staying connected, after the third try it usually stays connected. The other thing that’s kinda disappointing is the only app that seemed to ever work was Netflix! We got this since it’s a smart projector and shouldn’t have to use a tv box with it, we still have to plug in our Apple TV or console if we want to watch anything other than Netflix on it. Oh having the thread for a camera mount on the bottom would be cool so you could put it on a tripod or screw it into other mounts on ceilings would be nice also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Upon opening this projector I didn't know what to expect since this is my first one. Once it was plugged in, I was pleasantly surprised that it had apps already installed. It was very easy to operate including setting up the wifi and focusing the picture. The picture quality is great. It also has an hdmi port to attach a laptop or firestick for other viewing options. I love this projector and I am ready for my first movie night.
